annotation_sentence: Oh, hello Aina! Yes, this is Amir. How are you?
rationale: The sentence contains a greeting ('Oh, hello Aina!'), an affirmation ('Yes, this is Amir'), and an inquiry ('How are you?'), which are all speech acts.

annotation_sentence: Oh, I miss her too! Please tell her I say hello, and I will visit soon.
rationale: The sentence contains an expression of emotion ('Oh, I miss her too!'), a request ('Please tell her I say hello'), and a promise ('I will visit soon'), which are all speech acts.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I will plan. Thank you for call. It was nice talk, Aina.
rationale: The sentence contains an affirmation ('Yes, I will plan'), an expression of gratitude ('Thank you for call'), and a compliment ('It was nice talk, Aina'), which are all speech acts.
